  • Method Details

    • drawDashboard

      public static javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane drawDashboard(PlayerState player, double pageHeight, javafx.scene.layout.VBox vBox, String username)
      Draws a DashBoard with all the students in the Entrance and DiningRoom, the professors and the towers
      Parameters:
      player - the player to draw the Dashboard of
      pageHeight - the height of the screen
      vBox - the VBox to attach the Dashboard to
      username - the username of the player who owns the Dashboard

    • drawDashboardText

      public static javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane drawDashboardText(PlayerState player, double pageWidth, double pageHeight, boolean isExpert)
      Draws the text under/over the DashBoard with the username of the given Player and, if the game is in ExpertMode, the number of coins they own
      Parameters:
      player - the player to insert in the text
      pageWidth - the width of the screen
      pageHeight - the height of the screen
      isExpert - true if the Game is in Expert Mode

    • drawMegaDashboard

      public static void drawMegaDashboard(PlayerState player, double pageHeight, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root, String username)
      Draws the dashboard of the player seeing the screen
      Parameters:
      player - the player who sees the screen
      pageHeight - the height of the screen
      root - the AnchorPane to attach the different components to
      username - the username of the Player ehose GUI will be drawn the given GameState on

    • drawMegaDashboardText

      public static void drawMegaDashboardText(PlayerState player, double pageWidth, double pageHeight, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root, boolean isExpert)
      Draws the text under/over the DashBoard with the username of the given Player and, if the game is in ExpertMode, the number of coins they own
      Parameters:
      player - the player to insert in the text
      pageWidth - the width of the screen
      pageHeight - the height of the screen
      root - the AnchorPane to attach te text to
      isExpert - true if the the Game is in Expert Mode
